values:
Superman Returns: was okay, continued the story pretty well, I saw it in 3D, alot more worth it in 3D.

Click: loved the movie, nothing like the trailers, a little bit sad but all in all its a pretty good movie.

Lake House: gawd that was confusing, sappy chick flick, all comes together in the end, okay story.

Tokyo Drift: Filled with action, as much as I didnt wanna see chinks drive.. i liked it, nice cars and sorta like the story, thought it was too short.

Cars: kid's movie, not much of a story.. i was quiet disapointed, you'd be much better off seeing Over the Hedge.

Next few movies are: Pirates of the Caribbean2, Devil wears Prada, You-me-and Dupree. If any of you wanna come tell me on msn :D It'll be fun.

So I've been working at the Keg lately, almost all men in the back.. kinda strange when you are surrounded by a dozen men. Wedding coming up on the 29th and I still havent bought a dress. Going to see Underwater 3D or 3D Wild Safari sometime soon. Oh and I officialy admit I have a problem, an Ice Cream addiction, I cant go a day without eating some. Camping in Osoyoos was awesome, going up to Christina Lake on the 17th of August for about a week, going to be fun :D Oh and Benny Benassi is here this friday, going to that unless the Plush will be gay and catch my fake id. Its going to soo amazing.

Final week of school.. and you guessed it, I'm still studying like hell. I was planning on getting all this done before Tuesday, work and all.. didnt happen, and now if I dont do great on this final I'm screwed... like, completely, with no one to blame but myself. I even took the day off work, which I'm sure pissed off at least three people, sitting here looking at the physics and realizing I dont know much.. *sigh*
I'm not a blonde anymore though, 110 bux later I'm a brunette. Not fond of it. But I wanted a dramatic change because my hair has always been one and the same.. and any streaks I ever tried to do faded in no time.. so now, its different. 110 bux on july 27th will make it lighter, hopefully... its just waaaay too different.
The Keg called me back, they want me as a cook there. Very exciting for me. A lot more money to be made with a lot less to do. BUT I will miss *almost* everyone at ABC. Everyone but Deb. I cant believe what she's said about me. Even as much as I hate Padley I still thought of him as a human being, but this woman, I just dont think she deserves... ah nevermind. I never thought an old lady could be, oh I cant even find a worhty word for her.
Going to Osoyoos on the 30th.. well leaving eve of the 29th. Going to be there until evening of the 3rd and then coming back. Its going to be another awesome vacation, its just too bad that Tim isnt coming down anymore.
Anyways yeah.. main things :P

As you all know it was my bday on the 20th. It went great, I wish I got more prezies tho *feels deprived*. I went shopping in the morning (and on the monday after) for prezies [Metrotown and Bellis Fair]. The entire evening was spent with Timmy doing want I wanted to go (Keg, Go Carting, Arcade.. It was too late to book the horseback riding). Anyways I enjoyed it.
So, Kevin (guy at work) always talks about how good he is at Halo and how good all the people are who he plays with.. Now I know quiet a few of YOU GUYS love HALO so, I think you should all play against each other sometime.. A beloved Halo night?
..On a different topic. I knew that when Timmy would recieve the answer from RMC there would be a major happy part to it and a major dissapointment, whichever way the answer would go. They rejected him, cause of his eyesight. Means he's staying around longer but, also that his dream that he worked so hard for is shattered.. *sigh* I hate things like this, no matter what the result, theres always a down part.
Oh and I got my ID so if anyone wants to go to a bar or club or anything.. I will if Im free :P

Still happy, very happy. Although, all fridays Tim picks me up from work to watch some movies with him and then he drives me to work in the morning... yesterday, I havent heard from him after four. I called him this morning (right before he starts work at nine), no answer. I'm worried, I hope he's okay.. I truly do.
So, Timmy is so close to getting an answer from the Royal Military College. If he recieves a letter this month,.. they've rejected him, if a phone call - they accepted him. So the wait continues. I'm so totaly torn on this subject I dont know what to think anymore.
There are two raves I'm attending in the next week or so (going to try to anyways). DARUDE - at Club XOX ..and DJ SHARAZ the previous day. Its two DJs I've always wanted to see, these wont be drugged up raves.. this will be a pure apreciation of these two very great DJs. It will only cost me 45 bux to buy ticket for both and I think thats helluva deal!
My BDAY IS SO FREAKING SOON. I took it off work and I'm going shoppin in USA in the morning. Then, I dont know.. but it'll be fun. And although I never want anything, I hope I get lotz of prezies.. cause I do love surprizes. MAY 20TH!!! WEEHEE..
...oh and aparently, this Sunday morning that I'll be working. It'll be hella busy. I hope not :P

So I'm in a wonderful mood today. YOU BETTER NOT RUIN IT OR I WILL HURT YOU. Midnight, Tim stopped by to drop off his graphing calc. 'cause I needed it for today but when I went to school I forgot it *oops*. He always makes me light up when I see him :). But, somehow my alarm clock didnt wake me up *was confused as I got up on my own an hour late*.. but still made it to B block happier 'cause of the extra sleep. Aced that math test, although felt kinda pressed for time near the end. We had a looong, but fun, discussion about materialism in Socials and then mom picked me up so we could go to ICBC for my knowledge test. I PASSED IT! 40 out of 41 (guess they shorten it if you keep getting em pretty much all right). Anyways, long overdue and fairly needed.. at least my dad will let me drive now grr. Then stopped by the hair salon to get some stuff 'cause I've ran out.. I definatly think I spend too much on things concerning my looks, but meh. Work called, dont know why.. wasnt there to answer the phone but I "hope" Kevin IS going to work tonight. Its sort of fine if you're sick one day, but not two.. especially not Thursday AND Friday.
Anyways I'm all happy and stuff, :D End of the week, happy end, and after work there will be the joyus weekend with friends and Timmy. :D:D:D

On Monday I had to spend the whole day at home with my parents because Tim was workin 'till almost six. Yeah, going to try to NEVER do that again.. just reminds me why I wanna move the hell out of here.. ugh. Then went to see him line one of the provincial games, sorta fun.. cept for the being there an hour before the game thing. One of the players got badly hurt and was twitching on the ice until the ambulance guys carried him off.
People seem to find this strange. I like ice cream. I like it enough that I will eat not only at 3pm, but at 3am, at midnight, for breakfast, as a before school snack, as a chaser for alcohol, when its freezing outside, when im sitting in an ice rink and ofcourse any other possible time. lol.
Oh, back to the unbearable living conditions. I cherish the weekends with Tim.. not only 'cause he's the greatest, but because coming back home seems like punishment.
Timmy's been tring to get in the RMC(Royal Military College) for two years now. Hasnt yet. I asked him what would happen if he got in this year, where he would study first. He said in a totaly.. careless manner.. that he'd be sent away at beginning of July to somewhere else in Canada for four years. The happy atmosphere that constantly fills my head suddenly disappered, but I dismissed the horrible thought with a "well, I sure hope you wont get in this year then." Didn't really think of it much after than 'till I lay down in my bed and suddenly the thoughts struck my happy atmosphere again. The thought of him leaving me and out of nowhere I started crying. I realized this and thought to myself, wtf! But that is how strongly I feel, I guess consiously I didnt quiet realize it. He just means too much to me now. As high as I thought my standards were for men before I met him, now that I know how great a man can be.. lets just say he better stay with me or I'll be one lonely girl trying to match now 'OMG so much higher' standards. It's a dream, from which I hope I never wake up to be an emo girl LOL.
The other day I decided to bleach my hair, started doing it, got too chicken and washed the MaxiBlonde out in 15 mins >.> its pale yellow, I dont like it. I wanna dye it light, greyish brown and put blonde streaks in.. But its going to cost me... err I'll leave it for a bit, let my hair rest. I did go and chop off all the dead ends which is nice.. but I dont really like the haircut the guy gave me either...
Oh and I've been clean for... man, too long now.. NOTHING in my system. Wonderful. But, I dont really see myself being much healthier. You think that some good would come out of this. lol.
..and I got a new CELLPHONE! Thats right :D Samsung a920, its a purty mp3 flip phone, SO MANY features.. and was totaly free for 30bux a month with so much free stuff.. too lazy to write it all out 'cause I'm sleepy - good night.

You know I'm never the one for celebrating this.. and now when I really could, I cant. I'm busy from 6am to 10pm with a half an hour break (3:30-4) which I will spend getting from school, to work. Maybe I'll ask my physics teacher to let me out a bit earlier so I can have a snack and have dad drive to work. Definatly too busy for me, but its fine, 'cause its a cooking shift, and its worth it.
I, for one, is endless greatful for my man. Funny, I actually go to bed every night thankin the higher power for bring him into my life. I never though men like that even existed. I guess with the guys I've dated all my hope for ever finding someone good was annihilated and as a surprize, there he is, and he loves me.
ps, got my things from eBay, the lotion is great and the DC Shoes I got with make good work shoes.. black n leather, nothing that great looking - but good for work. Nighty night.

So, lived a week my man. Clearly not enough, but parents missed me. I dont know how the hell they'll cope when I move out. Oh well, they'll live. He's wonderful, and we're both busy enough that we dont annoy each other and agree with each other on so much that its that nice being together.
Work is ridiculous. Sure now I get line cook shifts but aparently now I'm doing a shitty job as a dishwasher. Eff that. I do a better job than I usualy did and thats not enough for em. If my life didnt depend on earning money so much at the moment I'd quit and find something else. I'll get over it.. just gotta not work mornings.
Otherwise, life is good.. Everything is happening as it should. I'm happy. Ebay is awesome.. and I want to go see Final Destionation3 this friday (where is it playing?).. Writing two provincials on Tuesday to finish off this semester. Yup. Happy, happy. Gnite.

problem. whats wrong? nothing. then whats the problem? exactly it. now this may seem strange. well very, to me anyways. but you know they say 'arguments/fighting is healthy in a relationship'.. uh, what if we agree on everything, on.. everything. i'm not kidding either. theres nothing wrong with the man. he doesnt do drugs, he even quit all tobacco products for me. he's really athletic, intelligent, smart, mature and responsible but at the same time boy-ish, loves me.. and yet. whats missing? i kinda feel like something is. its just all too good. its been bugging me for a few days, i told him that.. and he said 'well if we dont disagree on anything doesnt that mean we are just that much better suited for each other'. Help? maybe im just crazy. that is what i get told like every day....
(seriously, comment.)

So I torture myself through a sleepless night 'cause I'm so sick. I really should have stayed home. At about 8 I decide that theres no possible way I'm going to be able to go to work. Phone in, Ingrid answers, I tell her that I'm feeling way too sick to come to work.. her response 'so we wont have a dishwasher then, great, i'll tell brandon when he comes in'. I swear the woman hates me, I remember one time I asked her to try to clear off the dishes and not just throw them all down.. she spazzed on me how she shouldnt be clearing dishes when customers are waiting for her. Thats, EVERY time? Right.. w/e.
Anyways Tim drops me off at home on his way to the rink. I get into bed, tell my mom to get me a thermometer 'cause Timmy said I felt a little hot. Guess what? 39 degree celsius. I'm coughing my ass off. My nose is so plugged I can barely breathe and all the pressure, coughin n trying to clear my nose is giving me THE biggest headache. So I lay there almost twitching 'cause it all feels so uncomfortable and I cant sleep.. eventually take 10-15 min naps. Mom measures my temprerature once in a while, keeps feeding me pills and stuff.. it was horrid. At about one I cant stay in bed anymore just feels too weird, try to be downstairs a bit but its just too uncomfortable so I go back to bed. Timmy calls asking if I'll be able to go to the mall.. yeah not happening. But he did stop by after. The guy's wonderful. I dont know how the hell I got so lucky with this one :P
..thats my horrid day, I'm still sick.. but hoping to be better by tomorrow's family dinner. (heh, not mine.)

He kinda makes me feel like I'm in a TV show sometimes, no, not the unrealistic part.. the part where theres romance I guess, when a couple's in embrace and most people go 'oh, i wish it was like that, wish he was that sweet, cared that much'. He does some of the most meaningful things, out of nowhere. Its kind of strange, I actually see myself getting attached already. But I wont, theres no way I'm letting myself do that.. yet. It just all seems to be going a bit too perfect.
So, ..raves. Hope anyone who went, enjoyed last night's rave.. and hope the crazy ones will enjoy tonight's one too. I decided if I have money - I'm attending NYE rave for sure. Other than that, most of my money has been going to.. you guessed it, christmas presents. Anyone I get a chance to see - will get something from me.. I have already bought half of the "big" presents for people so I better see you at least before New Years.
January 13th.. or at least I think thats the date. Room at the Holiday Inn. Renting snowboard n stuff. Buying a ride pass. Bringin lots of extra cash. Going to have tons of fun that weekend :) (This is with Tim, Ryan, Amanda and possibly Kim n Brent).
Anyways.. thats all for now..

Note to self: do all christmas shopping in August.
Seriously, I dont know how I'm going to do it. I have the money. I kinda have the time, but when I'm actually in the mall.. I get lost. The only things I ever find are for myself. I need help!!!
Tim is sweet. Maybe I can commit? We'll see I guess.
Just a few minutes ago I figured out the best Christmas (extra) gift that I want to give everyone I know, or well.. at least most people. I gotta find the time for it though...

..anyways, that is all for now.

..nothing's really changed at work, i thought it'd be kinda weird.. but really, why should it be? never did anything wrong so im just as happy to work there every day. funny how this whole week was totaly WASTED 'cause I was sick.. I hate getting sick *note to self: build up immune system*.
sorted things out with tim, after i bitched him out he calmed me down and just explained how our schedules are just so fucked up that this is the way its going to be for a while,.. but he still wants to be with me. oddball. my really gorgeous oddball :D who's going to teach me to be as good at hockey as him.
I'm going to 'officialy' start my christmas shopping today. My first year of having an actual job. I love it. I get to buy everyone decent presents :D which makes me really happy. I may even buy some for people I'm not quiet fond of, but hey.. it is Christmas right. I already picked out a few *perfect* presents for some people :D
so aparently I'm going to be missing THREE raves in december. Grr. Freeze, Winterbreakz, and the NYE rave. Gah.. oh well, I get to not waste a lot of money and keep my mom company 'cause dad still decided to go to Cuba for the holidays.
School's going okay, report cards have been mailed home. Still havent got mine.. I think I did pretty good this term. two A's n two B's i think.. but hey! I may be able to take rockschool next semester so before that I'll pay a few visits to ricky n brad so I can have some practice on the bass before classes start.
but yeah, im far too distracted so ciao people, hope you all are having a good life too.

first of all <font size=10>FUCKING MEN!</font size>

now that im done with that... err, went to see Walking in Line tonight. Stupid me, thought it was that movie that had the Rock in it.. turns out, no, its a Johny Cash movie.. mostly about how divorces are wrong, how his dad hates him and about his drug problem. Great. In a way, I'd rather have seen that gangstur fifty cent movie.. Get Rich or Die Trying.. Actually, I dont know.. it sounds pretty awful to me. Anyways, a few people might find this movie good, go see it if you dont know the story behind Johny.

But Tim FUCKING PISSED ME OFF TODAY. I was so damn close to just walking away, and he'd stand there all confused wondering what the fuck could he possibly have done wrong. FUCK! Well tomorrow at noon when he's supposed to call, he's going to realize all the things he does wrong in life.

Other than that, the day went fine, although by the time we got to the bus stops - the buses werent runnin anymore. I booked tomorrow off work though,.. I'm extremly happy that Jared was my little archangel and took my shift for tomorrow. Forever greatful. Now I have a shitload of homework to finish off so after I have that nice little talk at noon, the rest of my day will be dedicated to.. hw.

Well, not much is going on really. As usual work/school taking my precious 'having a life' time away from me. And when on the free days I actually plan something - it ends up not happening. Kinda getting way too used to this 'routine' now. Kev might be stopping by after work tomorrow to see my doggy, I seriously dont know whats with him and dogs.. :S My mommy bought me a present for her birthday (it was on the 6th of November and I got her precious gifts that she just adored), a month of tanning. So, by December,.. I should be tanned :P
Oh, and I've decided not to go to Freeze, I'd rather get people prezies for christmas.. plus I can always go to the next one, which I plan to do. And you should all come, for my sake.
I havent seen any movies lately. Every time I plan to go - something else comes up. Oh well, no biggie really..
I've noticed how with the lack of life, anyone I ever knew have become acquitances more than anything. Friends isnt really the term I'd use to describe, well.. almost any of you. I dont have time for, anything these days.. which is good in a way, 'cause I get to concentrate on the important stuff; like self improvement, schooling and work.
But guess what? Remember how I all of a sudden just became happy - I STILL AM! :P lol.

I wonder if its possible to become a rave addict? I really want to go to Freeze now.. on December 9th, this week the tickets are 35 bux ( presale ) and the rave is on December 9th.
Shouldnt I be at school you say? Its lunchtime and all. Yes, it sure is. But when I feel like I'm going to pass out every five minutes, and I mean doing w/e then all sound shutting off and everything around me starts getting darker until i try to shake it off. Yeah, boo school. I slept until 11, going to go in for the math test last block and then come back here sleep some more and do homework. I doubt I'll be going to work today unless I feel better, not really my choice - my mom doesnt even wanna let me outta the house. That means I cant give Aaryn her present and Brandon will be upset:( ...anyways gotta go get ready.. have a good day ya'll.

WAS FUCKING AWESOME. cept for mom ruining the beginning of it by messing up the way I had to travel there. Got there around 11, got searched (god, i love the fact that I can wear a bra). Gave all my shit to the coatcheck and then danced 10 hours straight.. mostly with some guy. But 16 caps made it all about the music, the people didnt matter, the security didnt matter, it was me, and the trance. I've never danced so much, all out, before. It was amazing. I just loved it. Most likely will attend any massive raves coming up. And some of you were worried that I was gunna die, pfft. Met quiet a few people since no one I knew was there. Too bad that I didnt care enough to get their numbers or anything at 7am.. but daaamn. It was just unbelievable.

So to my suprize, a few people are attending it who I didnt think I'd see there. But hey, more the merrier, and it will be my last time doing E so.. I'll be having fun. A little comment Brandon made today at work about it when I told him I can work the morning before it.. "In the morning?" -"Yes, the morning before the rave" "You wanna work before the rave?" "Yes!" "Do you wanna take the rest of the week off *laughs*" "*growls* No, I'll be fine". So I will definatly enjoy it. Got my white kitty costume almost done.. gotta buy those shoes though. Too bad some of ya who I really wanted to come arent coming.. *tear* You're missing one helluva night. Last event of the Pacific Colisium 'till probably when Playland opens again. I'm so glad I got my ticket early, they are almost ALL sold out. The tickets that arent are quiet pricy lol.. I feel sorry for those who have to buy em at that price. W00tness. 9 days left, seems like forever. NINE DAYS PEOPLE!

Take this quiz at QuizGalaxy.com


Take this quiz at QuizGalaxy.com

I uh, screwed myself over. Too many guys, only one me. In a week or so I'll have to choose and regret my decision or something. I just know I will. They are all gorgeous, they are all potentially good boyfriends (seem to be nice guys). I actually asked out Noga, BUT he's a stoner.. meaning, I'd be repeating the whole dating Zac thing. If it turns out that way I'll.. . Actually I'm going to ask him tomorrow or something how he likes his relationships, if it doesnt fit me- he can just be my gorgeous friend. Going to see a movie with Tony on saturday, he's so excited, its so cute.. damn them virgins, they just tempt us all to be that much more evil. I'm trying to force Allon to just ask the goddam Sebastian.. Well we moved English rooms, and this one is smaller and arranged differently.. he sits.. uh.. on my right.. with his desk touching mine.. so he's.. not even a foot away from me. Damn he's hot. And Tim, I forgot to mention Tim.. he was another lust from first sight.. why do guys have to have sexy voices, looks and personalities.. grr. But I called him once, he was at school.. havent called him since. Aaryn told me to go for Jared, but.. how the hell would that ever happen, I see him maybe once in two weeks.
So.. going to see that movie saturday. Hanging with Noga sunday(mebbe). Working most of the time.. Oh, my contacts arrived today.. mmmm nice and white. Maybe I'll wear em to school tomorrow and freak people out. Sounds like an awesome idea. So, I'm going to go do my Math homework and then to bed. 'Night all.

OMFG HE IS SO FUCKING SEXY!!! AND HIS CAR IS AS SEXY AS HE IS AND JUST ADDS MORE TO HIS GODLIKE SELF.. mmmm Brandon.. man, just that little car ride and talk on the way home, watching him speed off just put so much energy in me, made me wanna run home :D
Anyways about half an hour into work I got these razor sharp pains in the tummy but worked through it 'till closing. I had shitloads of dishes and near the end I was so close to to just saying "sorry I need to go home" 'cause the moving and lifting jsut made the pain worse.. but the little angel of a manager Brandon helped me. He's so great... his gf so doesnt deserve him. Grr get him Aaryn! You deserve someone that awesome. Man he's just indescribable.. I doubt anyone of you have every had such an endlessly amazing manager.
P.S. - Aaryn.. his favourite video game is Hockey.. :P
Going into work tomorrow morning.. hopefully I wont be in pain and wont look annoyingly slow. I love working there.. oh and Nikki, I asked if he needed anyone at the moment and mentioned that you came in and applied this morning and he was just like "not at this moment" "oh, this laminated thing, I didnt want ruin it" and looked at the application in the little plastic folder thingy so weirdly.. Heh.. mmm. lol
Today was a really fun night, I loved it. I love the people there way too much. :)
Have a good night all.

SUCKED. SO many people are just fucking pissing me off. Some of the moments were nice and enjoyable to just have them ruined shortly after. FUCK YOU (to way too many people that have somehow made my day less enjoyable). But now I'm home from work, ate.. and I'm going to order my contacts.. so its an upside.
I also bought the ticket for Dooms Night today after I cashed my check. 65$ ticket. Its going to be one helluva night/morning.
Aaryn went camping, heh.. *hopes she has fun despite all the not so great things*. Brandon called Kevin at work today saying he won a grand on one horse only.. oh my.. I want to make money that fast.
Anyhoot... byez.

So I'm not getting enough sleep. Shows the circles under my eyes. That being my only problem, I dont really care about how much I sleep - I do care about if it effects the way I look. GRRR.

Soo apparently we (Tourism class) are taking a trip to.. WHISTLER. Why? Fun. Uhh.. so random field trip to WHISTLER. Man, I love this high school!
The other day I was at out first Student Council meeting. We were coming up with every idea possible to make this school year that much more fun. The guy who runs with (name unknown, some random teacher) accepted every idea suggested and just kept repeating how we have unlimited funds. OMG!! I love this school even more. We can do ANYTHING. W00T! Why didn't I transfer to Fox before? Hella Beats me.
So for the billionth time, takin the bus from work.. Crisco always has to be there. Why? Oh god why! I kinda feel like he's stalking me which cant possibly be it. But grrr. Also I've been seeing Gordy around A LOT. Seems weird 'cause he knows me and yet we dont talk.. but at least I dont find him err, whats the word for it.. just very un..likable lol. Maybe 'cause I dont have to lol "Deal" with him. lol
Anyways another satisfying day, if nothing goes wrong.. hanging out with Shane on his 21st b-day tomorrow :)

So as always, fun day at work. It wasnt actually "fun", there wasnt much to do so that was resolved by talking lol. Kevin is so nice,  I love talkin with him.. although dont really do it *that* much, I dont know why.. maybe 'cause I think he'd rather be left alone or maybe doesnt wanna hear from me. Meh, assumptions. So... tonight when I came in Kevin was doing my dishes and it took me a little bit to get my 'spot' back.. and as I started, Brandon joined me.. doing them 100times faster than me until he pretty much took over. So I was left standing there confused 'cause well, he's takin away my work. Not that I'm complaining.. Turns out I had to 'learn' to cut the turkey. So, the cutting part was easy... now the weighing part..... Uh... lol. I wrapped all of them 2.5lbs by the scale and looked at the pieces and they seemed so small in the end, so I cleared scale and it turns out.. more than half of what I've wrapped, was less than the scale showed before so I had to redo it.. gaaaaah. Brandon called me turkey as he left, sure anything sounds cute coming from him but when thinkin about it.. turkey? grr lol. But yeah, Kevin is really nice.. Grr, I dont like meeting such nice people, makes disliking everyone all together a lil bit harder because there is hope for humanity in those few wonder people I meet.
Anyways talked to.. hm I'm not 100% sure of the guy's name.. Brandon too I think, in my Art class. I've met him before when we were trying to buy E off Gordy. The past week we've seen each other around but never said anything.. As I was putting my stuff in my bag at the end of class, I lift my head up.. and he's, out of nowhere, sitting beside me. We had a little talk, he seemed really nice.. I hope we continue 'communicating'. He's also really good looking. Grr, like a puppy.. damn those guys that remind me of puppies. And he's not a druggie like I thought he was when I first met him, he promised to his mom he'd never touch that stuff again and hasnt.. cause "He loves his mommy" (his words). I even pushed the topic of doing them again but he completely denied. Thats so awesome.
After school mom picked me up and we went to the mall, I got myself a skirt.. and gettin my shoes back tomorrow.. so on monday I can be all purty and girly LOL. I swear those shoes will be the end of me.
Overall, I had a good day.. I'm happy. Hope you all had a nice day too. Gnite.

For the longest time I had no attraction (the sort of, oh I wonder how he'd be as a bf)to any guys what so ever. Lately I've looked at things and I sort of have three. Which makes me smile, because there are guys out there that I may actually sometime be able to try a relationship out with. All of the situations are difficult but meh, thats just a lifestory LOL.

How there is so much negativity always surrounds me. Especially in my family. I swear if someone told these people "You know, there is such a thing like being positive" they'd shit their pants. This is why its crucial for me to move out. I'm a freaking happy person, I like being this way.. I DO NOT like when people do their best to try to aggravate me or make me upset. FUCK YOU. Learn to fuckin live through your problems and not bring everyone else around you into them.. maybe others are happy and you are ruining THEIR lives now. Now some of you may be reading this and getting some emotions thinking this is about you. Telling you now. It is not. This is been brought on by my parents and ONLY by them. They are the two most negativly 'set' people in the frickin world. Or like *the unsaid* they have both gained 24/7 PMS. I swear pretty soon I'll just pull my knife on them and tell them to shut the fuck up. Grrr they get me SO mad, and I bottle it inside 'cause if I say anything.. its just going to be worse and I'll get ever MORE mad.
Other than that, went shopping again.. FUCKING STERLING. I'M NEVER BUYING SHOES FROM YOU AGAIN. Okay so I bought these really purty shoes that I liked, when I tried to put my foot in the them without the sock thingy my little toe felt really uncomfortable (this was now at home) so I decided once the weekend comes I'll return them. So today was interesting.. Went out to Ridge with Nikki, got ourselves appointments for the piercings. Stopped by San Francisco and bought ourselves a few things. Got back, hung out for a bit.. and I ended up running onto the bus.. Heh, sorry Nikki :P
Well as most of you know. I've declared myself incapable of keeping a relationship now. It doesnt bother me, I'm just glad I finally decided that I have that problem. Oh well. But as my and Shane's conversation showed.. I've somehow turned myself off. I just simply do not care about anything anymore. My feelings are sort of absent. I'm here as maybe a shell of that girl I used to be. Nothing is really serious to me anymore. Its all some kind of a joke or a game. It keeps me happy no matter what comes along because its all amusing. I, subconciously know this is quiet horrible and not healthy. But really, does it matter? I like being this way. Sure in the long term it will probably interfere with a lot of things but I'm happy so who cares?!! I'm entertained, I have fun, my motivation comes out of nowhere. It is a good thing.
So recently a few of my friends lost ones they have grown attached to. Thats really a shame. The two couples seemed so happy together... But this is life I guess, things do go wrong. But it was those two people that I was so happy to see finally.. well, getting attached to someone. They deserved something good. I really didnt want those relationships to ever falter or anything..
